long_description: Don't let cold weather push your workouts indoors. The men's Sugoi Firewall 180 Jacket offers stellar performance with a stretch thermal interior and weather-protective exterior. Stretch-knit, laminated polyester resists wind and water and allows free range of motion; warm, wicking backing is ideal for running or skiing. Plush collar and soft draft flap guard against cold wind and zipper abrasion. Stretch cuffs with thumbholes keep out wind and snow. Adjustable hem cord can be accessed from both zippered front pockets; rear zip pocket. Reflective elements on sleeves, pocket zippers and front zipper. Men's Sugoi Firewall 180 jacket has an average weight of 15 oz. Semifitted cut is not too loose and not too tight. Closeout.
short_description: Don't let cold weather push your workouts indoors. The men's Sugoi Firewall 180 Jacket offers stellar performance with a stretch thermal interior and weather-protective exterior.
